info.name: Typeracer - Eye Friendly
info.description:
It doesn't work? Try Stylebot (Chrome Webstore). Click on "Show CSS Code"
copy all between the first and last curly brace, and paste it on Stylebot.
Thats it. Let me know if it works for you.

Your noctua

PS: I've 32268 races completed, with this dark gray scheme.
info.additionalInfo:
1.0 - Beta Version for Chrome, Remove Ads
1.1 - Enables option for different languages
1.2 - Makes style specific to typeracer URL
1.3 - New Avatars (Beta Version)
1.4 - Hide new advertisements that came along
1.5 - BETA - Avatars included into CSS (unsolved the conflict with premium avatars)

data.title: Great theme, but avatars are broken
Thank a lot, but there is a bug
Hey, can you fix this bug? The avatar breaks when the race starts. Thanks!
